apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Configure API keys for different AI providers
apiKeys.helpTitle: API key required for chat and QA features
apiKeys.helpContent: To enable chat and QA functionality, please provide an API key from your selected provider.

defaultModel.title: Default Chat Model
defaultModel.description: Select the Chat model to use
defaultModel.helpTitle: Default model is OpenRouter Gemini 2.5 Flash
defaultModel.helpContent: Set your OpenRouter API key in 'API keys' to use this model, or select a different model from another provider.

helpContent.chat: Chat: Regular chat mode for general conversations and tasks. Free to use with your own API key.
helpContent.vaultQA: Vault QA (Basic): Ask questions about your vault content with semantic search. Free to use with your own API key.
helpContent.copilotPlus: Obsidian-Mate Plus: Covers all features of the 2 free modes, plus advanced paid features including chat context menu, advanced search, AI agents, and more. Check out obsidiancopilot.com for more details.

openPluginIn.title: Open Plugin In
openPluginIn.description: Choose where to open the plugin

sendShortcut.title: Send Shortcut
sendShortcut.description: Choose keyboard shortcut to send messages
sendShortcut.helpContent: If your selected shortcut doesn't work, check Obsidian's Settings → Hotkeys to see if another command is using the same key combination. You may need to remove or change the conflicting hotkey first.

autoAddActiveContent.title: Auto-Add Active Content to Context
autoAddActiveContent.description: Automatically add the active note or Web Viewer tab (Desktop only) to chat context when sending messages.

autoAddSelection.title: Auto-Add Selection to Context
autoAddSelection.description: Automatically add selected text from notes or Web Viewer (Desktop only) to chat context. Disable to use manual command instead.

imagesInMarkdown.title: Images in Markdown
imagesInMarkdown.description: Pass embedded images in markdown to the AI along with the text. Only works with multimodal models.

suggestedPrompts.title: Suggested Prompts
suggestedPrompts.description: Show suggested prompts in the chat view

relevantNotes.title: Relevant Notes
relevantNotes.description: Show relevant notes in the chat view

autosaveChat.title: Autosave Chat
autosaveChat.description: Automatically saves the chat after every user message and AI response.

generateAIChatTitle.title: Generate AI Chat Title on Save
generateAIChatTitle.description: When enabled, uses an AI model to generate a concise title for saved chat notes. When disabled, uses the first 10 words of the first user message.

defaultConversationFolder.title: Default Conversation Folder Name
defaultConversationFolder.description: The default folder name where chat conversations will be saved. Default is 'copilot/copilot-conversations'

defaultConversationTag.title: Default Conversation Tag
defaultConversationTag.description: The default tag to be used when saving a conversation. Default is 'ai-conversations'

conversationFilenameTemplate.title: Conversation Filename Template
conversationFilenameTemplate.description: Customize the format of saved conversation note names.
conversationFilenameTemplate.helpTitle: Note: All the following variables must be included in the template.

chatHistorySort.title: Chat History Sort Strategy
chatHistorySort.description: Sort order for the chat history list

projectListSort.title: Project List Sort Strategy
projectListSort.description: Sort order for the project list

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language for Obsidian-Mate interface

chat.failedToSend: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.failedToSave: Failed to save chat as note. Check console for details.
chat.failedToEdit: Failed to edit message. Please try again.
chat.failedToDelete: Failed to delete message. Please try again.

models.apiKeyRequired: API key required for this model
models.addNewModelDescription: Add a new model to your collection.

qa.enableSemanticSearchDescription: Enable semantic search for meaning-based document retrieval. When disabled, uses fast lexical search only. Use 'Refresh Vault Index' or 'Force Reindex Vault' to build the embedding index.
qa.enableInlineCitationsDescription: When enabled, AI responses will include footnote-style citations within the text and numbered sources at the end. This is an experimental feature and may not work as expected for all models.
qa.embeddingModelDescription: Powers Semantic Vault Search and Relevant Notes. Enable Semantic Search to use it.
qa.embeddingModelHelp: This model converts text into vector representations, essential for semantic search and Question Answering (QA) functionality. Changing the embedding model will:
embeddingModelHelpItems: Require rebuilding your vault's vector index
qa.autoIndexStrategyDescription: Decide when you want the vault to be indexed.
qa.autoIndexNeverDesc: Manual indexing via command or refresh only
qa.autoIndexOnStartupDesc: Index updates when plugin loads or reloads
qa.autoIndexWarning: Warning: Cost implications for large vaults with paid models
qa.maxSourcesDescription: Obsidian-Mate goes through your vault to find relevant notes and passes the top N to the LLM. Default for N is 15. Increase if you want more notes included in the answer generation step.
qa.requestsPerMinuteDescription: Default is 60. Decrease if you are rate limited by your embedding provider.
qa.embeddingBatchSizeDescription: Default is 16. Increase if you are rate limited by your embedding provider.
qa.numPartitionsDescription: Number of partitions for Obsidian-Mate index. Default is 1. Increase if you have issues indexing large vaults. Warning: Changes require clearing and rebuilding the index!
qa.lexicalSearchRamLimitDescription: Maximum RAM usage for full-text search index. Lower values use less memory but may limit search performance on large vaults. Default is 100 MB.
qa.enableFolderGraphBoostsDescription: Enable folder and graph-based relevance boosts for lexical search results. When disabled, provides pure keyword-based relevance scoring without folder or connection-based adjustments.
qa.exclusionsDescription: Exclude folders, tags, note titles or file extensions from being indexed. Previously indexed files will remain until a force reindex is performed.
qa.inclusionsDescription: Index only the specified paths, tags, or note titles. Exclusions take precedence over inclusions. Previously indexed files will remain until a force reindex is performed.
qa.enableObsidianSync: Enable Obsidian Sync for Obsidian-Mate index
qa.disableIndexOnMobileDescription: When enabled, Obsidian-Mate index won't be loaded on mobile devices to save resources. Only chat mode will be available. Any existing index from desktop sync will be preserved. Uncheck to enable QA modes on mobile.
qa.embeddingModelSaved: Embedding model saved. Enable Semantic Search to build the index.

plus.notPlusUser: You are not an Obsidian-Mate Plus user.

advanced.encryptionDescription: Encrypt API keys and sensitive data

newChatConfirm.title: Start New Chat?
newChatConfirm.description: This will clear the current conversation. Are you sure you want to continue?

resetSettingsConfirm.title: Reset All Settings?
resetSettingsConfirm.description: This will reset all Obsidian-Mate settings to defaults. This action cannot be undone.

restrictions.nonMarkdownFiles: Non-markdown files are only available in Obsidian-Mate Plus mode. Please upgrade to access this file type.
restrictions.urlProcessing: URL processing is only available in Obsidian-Mate Plus mode. URLs will not be processed for context.
restrictions.unsupportedFile: {{extension}} files are not supported in the current mode.

projects.createFirst: Create your first project to get started

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.apiKeyMissing: API key is missing. Please set it in settings.
errors.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
